H0.text: Which Bond villain has been played by Telly Savalas, Donald Pleasance, Charles Gray, and Max Von Sydow. Auric Goldfinger

H1.text: Which Bond villain has been played by Telly Savalas, Donald Pleasance, Charles Gray, and Max Von Sydow. Emilio Largo

H2.text: Which Bond villain has been played by Telly Savalas, Donald Pleasance, Charles Gray, and Max Von Sydow. Francisco Scaramanga

H3.text: Which Bond villain has been played by Telly Savalas, Donald Pleasance, Charles Gray, and Max Von Sydow. BLOFELD

A4.text: Blofeld was played by Telly Savalas in the film On Her Majesty's Secret Service.

A5.text: Donald Pleasance was cast as Blofeld in the films You Only Live Twice, On Her Majesty's Secret Service, and Diamonds Are Forever.
